description:
Haku Gessho and Oh Fuuki are brought to the fox spirit village by Tosan Yaya. Following after them, the spider youkai, Seitou, is determined to help Fuuki remember their romance from his past life. While Fuuki is off charming women at a local tavern, Gessho accompanies Suusu to get her book of reincarnation repaired. Seitou, on the advice of a mysterious fox spirit woman, tries to sprinkle a memory powder on Fuuki while he is in the tavern, but he discovers her and Seitou is confronted with his passionate hatred of youkai.
Source: crunchyroll
